title: BlackBoss_
author: BlackBoss_
content: Hello experts,I am writing Bitcoin Mining History and I need help for experts to organize Reward Types of Bitcoin mining chronologically. Wiki does not organize them.What types are first and what types are later?Can I group some types into one group?Thank you.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: I believe PPS was invented first, and everything else that utilizes "last N shares" or the like came later - though my guess would be all this coming sometime after 2012, when mining started to become difficult for the average person to do at home.
